Name: Wall Partition, Type: Gypsum with metal studs, Full Height, Fixed Below, Slip Track Above with returns

GeneralInformation.Description: Quantity is based upon 13'x100' Panels.  Quantity of wall damaged varies by damage state.
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given

DamageStates.Description: Screws pop-out, minor cracking of wall board, warping or cracking of tape.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Retape joints, paste and repaint both sides of  20 foot length of wall board.

DamageStates.Description: Moderate cracking or crushing of gypsum wall boards (typically in corners and in corners of openings).
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Remove 10 foot length of wall board (both sides), install new wall board (both sides),  tape, paste and repaint.

DamageStates.Description: Moderate cracking or crushing of gypsum wall boards (typically in corners and in corners of openings).
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Remove 50 foot length of wall board (both sides), install new wall board (both sides),  tape, paste and repaint.

DamageStates.Description: Significant cracking and/or crushing of gypsum wall boards- buckling of metal studs and tearing of tracks.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Remove and replace 10 foot length of metal stud wall, both sides of the gypsum wall board and any embedded utilities, and tape, paste and repaint.

DamageStates.Description: Significant cracking and/or crushing of gypsum wall boards- buckling of metal studs and tearing of tracks.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Remove and replace 50 foot length of metal stud wall, both sides of the gypsum wall board and any embedded utilities, and tape, paste and repaint.
